title: SAVORY TOMATO-BRAISED TILAPIA RECIPE
directions: Sprinkle fillets with seasoned salt; drizzle with lemon juice. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion; cook and stir until tender. Add tomatoes, peppers, broth, tomato paste, garlic powder and oregano; cook and stir 2-3 minutes longer.
Place fillets over tomato mixture; cook, covered, 6-8 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. If desired, serve with pasta. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (10 ounces) diced tomatoes and green chilies, undrained
3/4 cup chopped roasted sweet red peppers
